data.title: North Africa
data.meta_description: population - Free download as Text File (.txt), PDF File (.pdf) or read online for free. The document lists populations for countries and territories around the world. China has the largest population at 1.36 billion people, followed by India at 1.26 billion, and the United States at 320 million people. Some of the other most populous countries include Indonesia, Brazil, Pakistan, Nigeria, and Bangladesh, each with over 100 million people. Many smaller countries and territories are also listed, with populations ranging from under 1,000 to over 10 million people.
